授業目的: 英文欄参照/ Refer to the information below.
到達目標: 英文欄参照/ Refer to the information below.
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites. Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.

第1回:
Format: All 14 classes will be conducted face-to-face
Course Overview: Introduction, Goal Setting Activities, Course Set Up; Vocabulary Journal
トピック.授業計画1: This syllabus may be subject to revisions according to student needs and abilities plus any changes to the university calendar and the situation outside of the university.
トピック.授業外学習2: This course builds on each previous lesson. Homework will be regularly assigned each week and is expected to be completed before the following class. The amount of study time required will vary from week to week depending on the subject/skill being reviewed. However, students can expect at least a minimum of 1 hour and a maximum of 2 hours of homework every week.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Practice tests and quizzes - 30%, Homework - 40%, Class participation - 30%
評価.備考Note0: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は下記URL（kwicのキャビネット）の「履修手続」を確認してください。
評価.URLリンク1/URL 11: 英語インテンシブ・プログラム　履修について
